name: Notfarawayville
description:
3d side-scroller.

A strange weather in a small village called Notfarawayville seems to be stuck. There's was no sun for what seems like an eternity. What's going to be next? See for yourself.

Mostly original content, including soundtrack, characters models and animations, etc. Didn't manage to make the last two scenes in time. But 85% of the game by the play time is there. Also, a lot of resources like cat's house are in a draft state. Though, they should still work :)

And I'm willing to finish this game.
